Detailed Description

Class for handling the voting packets.

In addition to the normal header this packet contains {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & \ HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & Rank {tabular}

int32  rank,

) 
 

Creates a new VotePacket with the supplied ip, port and rank.

Parameters:
ip The ip of the sender.
port The ownport of the sender.
rank The rank of the sender.
direct True if the packet is sent directly to the receiver.

Member Function Documentation

int VotePacket::betterThanThis (  int32  myRank,
uint16  myPort
)  const
 

Use this method to find out if this module is better than the sender of this packet.

It compares rank, ip and finally portnumber.

Returns:
1 if this module is better leader. \ -1 if the sender of the packet is better leader \ 0 if they are equal. This should never happen.

const char* VotePacket::directOrMultiDbg (   )  const
 

Returns "direct" or "multicast" depending on the value in the packet.

Returns the rank of the packet.
